1: <pb/><e>A ton bit David ti'</e> <pb/><t>A yin Cham Jehová chin say in colbalba. Nabaxac'al che yal ayin: Asi', c'ubaj el a ba bay witzlak axca no tz'iquin.</t>
2: <t>Ila wal eb nak yobtakwom, chi yaoc eb julbal yin tx'an julbalej, caw t'ininak chi yut eb, axa bay ewantak chi julwajtok eb yin eb anima watx'.</t>
3: <t>Ta a eb ikbajwom chi etaxtok, ¿tzetto wal ok yut ba mac watx' beybal? quex chi ayin.</t>
4: <pb/><t>Palta ayic' Cham Jehová bay is templo, tol asannej Cham ay yet. A bay satcan tu', a tu' ay is trono Cham, cax chi camc'ul yiloni, chi beyc'ulnen beybal eb anima.</t>
5: <t>A Cham chi beyc'ulnen eb anima watx', c'al eb yob, caw wal chi yajil Cham eb anima chi beybalnejc'al yaxc'aynakilal.</t>
6: <t>A Cham ok yatok k'ak'ej, axca yax nab yiban eb yobtakwom, c'al azufre ayoc k'ak'al. Ok yatok jun miman cak'ek' yet chi takcan el masanil. A Cham ok paktzen bay eb, atac'ala' yunben eb.</t>
7: <t>A Jehová tojol toni, chi cam c'ul yin masanil pojanil tojolal. Tix wal yuj tu xin, xan a eb anima tojol is beybal, ok yil eb yin Cham.</t>
